full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement: W6399-24EC11 Food Requirement
===========================================================

### General Information

* Refer to tender reference number: WS4308437357-Doc4310164496
* Amendment number: 1
* Solicitation number: WS4308437357
* Publication date: November 22, 2023
* Tender closing date: November 30, 2023 (14:00 EST)
* Amendment date: November 23, 2023
* Expected contract start date: November 30, 2023
* Expected contract end date: None
* Tender status: Expired

### Goods and Services Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified vendors to provide food and non-food items for military training exercises conducted by the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) in the United States. These exercises typically last up to two months and involve food services using portable kitchens at the training locations.

Only holders of Supply Arrangement # W6399-23DB05 have been contacted and are eligible to submit a proposal for this requirement.

### Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

The successful vendor will be selected based on the lowest price. Bids received after the closing time of 14:00 EST on November 30, 2023, will not be considered.

### Additional Information

The notice is available on the government's website; however, there are no attachments or supporting documentation. You may contact Shamael Malko-Moore (SPAC/PSPC) at shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any inquiries.

### Procurement Categories and Trade Agreements

This tender is categorized under:

* Food Beverage and Tobacco Products (50000000)
* Food and beverage industries (73130000)
* Food and nutrition services (85150000)

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free
